column4: Hey guys, what do I need to install to get a usb external terabyte drive to work in ubuntu server
nothing, all the tools you need are available by default, with the exception of like... xfsprogs for xfs afficanados
It does not show in fdisk -l
what does the kernel buffer say when you attach the device?
Eh, how do I check that
`sudo apt-get install pastebinit' in your terminal then 'dmesg | pastebinit'
have you been plugging and unplugging the device several times?
A person in ubuntu-server says to install ubuntu-standard
figure it out or need more help? :P
Eh, I guess the port went bad, it worked last time, but I switched it to another one and it worked
yup that would explain your kernel buffer, congrats ;)
you have to rule stuff like that out for us, in the future :P
